column1: The hospital has modern, up-to-date equipment
column2: The hospital's physical facilities are clean and visually appealing (reception, waiting area, consultation rooms, toilets, wards)
column3: The hospital's employees are well-dressed and have a neat and professional appearance
column4: Materials associated with the service are visually appealing
column5: When a hospital employee promises to do something by a particular time, they do it
column6: When a patient has a problem, the hospital's employees show a sincere interest in solving it
column7: The hospital provides its services at the time it promises to do
column8: The hospital always gets things right the first time
column9: The hospital maintains accurate and error-free records
column10: The hospital's employees tell the patients exactly when services will be performed
column11: The hospital's employees provide prompt service to patients
column12: The hospital's employees are always willing to help patients
column13: The hospital's employees are never too busy to respond to patients' requests
column14: The behaviour and attitudes of hospital employees instill confidence in patients
column15: Patients feel safe in all their dealings with the hospital and its employees
column16: The hospital's employees are consistently courteous to patients
column17: The hospital's employees are knowledgeable and able to answer patients' questions
column18: The hospital gives each patient individualised attention
column19: The hospital's employees express care in their interaction with patients
column20: The hospital and its employees have the patients' best interests at heart
column21: The hospital's employees understand the specific needs of each of their patients
column22: The operating hours of the hospital are convenient for all its patients
